sql.name: hirecircuitindicatorsinputreportpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: hirecircuitindicatorsinputreport.group
hirecircuitindicatorsinputreport.left
sql.item: select ' ',trim('租用电路合计-2M(条)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-国际及港澳台电路 *-2Mbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-省际电路-2Mbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-省内长途电路-2M *(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-城域网内电路-2M *(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路合计-155M(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-国际及港澳台电路 *-155Mbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-省际电路-155Mbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-省内长途电路-155M *(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-城域网内电路-155M *(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路合计-2.5G(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-国际及港澳台电路 *-2.5Gbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-省际电路-2.5Gbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-省内长途电路-2.5G *(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-城域网内电路-2.5G *(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路合计-10G(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-国际及港澳台电路 *-10Gbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-省际电路-10Gbps(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-省内长途电路-10G *(条)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('租用电路-城域网内电路-10G *(条)') from dual

sql.name: hirecircuitindicatorsinputreport.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('租用电路合计-2M(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000004) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-国际及港澳台电路 *-2Mbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000005) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-省际电路-2Mbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000006) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-省内长途电路-2M *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000010) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-城域网内电路-2M *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000011) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路合计-155M(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000012) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-国际及港澳台电路 *-155Mbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000014) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-省际电路-155Mbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000015) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-省内长途电路-155M *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000016) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-城域网内电路-155M *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000020) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路合计-2.5G(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000021) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-国际及港澳台电路 *-2.5Gbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000022) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-省际电路-2.5Gbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000024) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-省内长途电路-2.5G *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000083) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-城域网内电路-2.5G *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000085) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路合计-10G(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000088) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-国际及港澳台电路 *-10Gbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c536870946) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-省际电路-10Gbps(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c536870950) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-省内长途电路-10G *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c536870949) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('租用电路-城域网内电路-10G *(条)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c536870952) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
